description: An artwork by Jean-Michel Basquiat sold for a record $110.
title: Basquiat painting fetches record $110.5 million at New York auction

author: BBC News
description: A painting by the late New York artist Jean-Michel Basquiat breaks several price records.
title: Basquiat painting breaks records at $110.5m in New York

author: Katya Kazakina
description: An untitled portrait by Jean Michel-Basquiat sold for $110.5 million at Sotheby’s in New York, setting a record for any American artist. The buyer was Japanese online retail magnate Yusaku Maezawa.
title: Basquiat Portrait Soars to Record $110 Million at Sotheby's

description: NEW YORK (AP) — A 1982 artwork by Jean-Michel Basquiat sold for a record $110.5 million at Sotheby's auction of contemporary art Thursday night. Sotheby's said the sale of "Untitled" was an auction record for the artist. It also set a record price for an American artist at auction. The painting's graffiti-like typography depicts a face in the shape of a skull. "Tonight, Jean-Michel Basquiat entered the pantheon of artists whose works have commanded prices over $100 million, including Picasso, Giacometti, Bacon, and Warhol," said Gregoire Billault, head of Sotheby's Contemporary Art Department in New York.
title: Basquiat painting fetches record $110.5M at New York auction

author: Spiegel Online
description: Neuer Auktionsrekord: Das Gemälde "Untitled" des Amerikaners Jean-Michel Basquiat hatte einst nur 19.000 Dollar gekostet - ein Milliardär aus Japan toppte die Summe nun um ein Vielfaches. Die Live-News.
title: +++ Der Morgen live +++: Milliardär zahlt Rekordpreis für Gemälde

description: Der höchste Preis, der je für die Arbeit eines US-Künstlers erzielt wurde: Ein Gemälde von Jean-Michel Basquiat ist für die Rekordsumme von 110,5 Millionen Dollar versteigert worden.
title: Basquiat-Gemälde für 110 Millionen Dollar versteigert
